summary: Calm and quiet Daniel starts on Wall Street. His womanizing colleague, Tommy, encourages him to meet women. He unknowingly meets Tommy's girlfriend, Beth, and ends up in her 5 women book club. Will he find the woman?

keywords: william shakespeare character|new york city|manhattan new york city|cheating boyfriend|book club
title: The Good Guy
